name: BGTaskScheduler.Error.Code
desc: An enumeration of the task scheduling errors.

items.name: case notPermitted
items.desc: A task scheduling error indicating the app isn’t permitted to schedule the task.

items.name: case tooManyPendingTaskRequests
items.desc: A task scheduling error indicating that there are too many pending tasks of the type requested.

items.name: case unavailable
items.desc: A task scheduling error indicating that the app or extension can’t schedule background work.
